page.title: 07WEST KILBRIDE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our{old school}was{built}in{1875}and it stood till its 100th anniversary in 1975. However it didn't stand for much longer as in{May 1980}it was{burnt down. Now in 1985 we still don't know the cause of the fire _ whether it was an electrical fault or whether it was deliberate. In February 1981 the first turf was dug for the new school, and in{1983}our{new school}was comple- ted. The main building holds the P1's - P6's. The P7's are in{huts}outside. There are about 500 pupils in the school altogether and every year about 70 pupils from P7 leave for Ardrossan Acadamy. School begins at 9.00am.We get our morning play -time at 10.40am to 11.00am. The next is for lunch. We get out at 12.20pm till 1.30pm. The next interval is at 2.30pm till 2.40pm, we go home at 3.35pm.
